it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent the deck of a match; the deck can be shuffled; it's possible to draw a card from it or draw it in a trump manner, placing the drawn card on its bottom; it's possible to obtain the String version of the deck.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      This is the constructor that creates the deck, initializing its cards according to the deck composition of the game
      Deck(java.lang.String deck)
      This is the constructor that creates the deck starting from a string

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card drawCard()
      This method is charged to remove (draw, in game terms) the Card on the top of the Deck
      Card drawTrump()
      This method is charged to remove a Card from the deck when it's a trump and puts it on the bottom of the Deck
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards() 
      void shuffle()
      This method is charged to shuffle the Deck before the Card distribution
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method converts to String the current Deck

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • Deck

        public Deck(java.lang.String deck)
     throws CardException,
            DeckException
        This is the constructor that creates the deck starting from a string
        Parameters:
        deck - the String describing the deck to be created
        Throws:
        CardException - if a card inside the deck description is not a possible card
        DeckException

    • Method Detail

      • getCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards()
        Returns:
        The list of the cards composing the Deck

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        This method is charged to shuffle the Deck before the Card distribution

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
              throws DeckException
        This method is charged to remove (draw, in game terms) the Card on the top of the Deck
        Returns:
        the removed cards
        Throws:
        DeckException - if there are no Cards to be removed

      • drawTrump

        public Card drawTrump()
               throws DeckException
        This method is charged to remove a Card from the deck when it's a trump and puts it on the bottom of the Deck
        Returns:
        the trump Card
        Throws:
        DeckException - if it's the wrong moment to draw the trump (which should be the 7th, when there are 34 cards in the deck)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method converts to String the current Deck
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String version of the Deck
